name: Next.js Datadog dd-trace env/tags 最小
description: DD_SERVICE/DD_ENV/DD_VERSION とタグ適用の最小例

files.template:
import tracer from 'dd-trace';
export async function register(){ if(!(tracer as any)._initialized){ tracer.init({ env: process.env.DD_ENV, service: process.env.DD_SERVICE, version: process.env.DD_VERSION, tags: { 'service.version': process.env.DD_VERSION || '0.0.0' } }); } }
